1.title: Week 1: Getting to Know You

episode of.title: Master Class: The Web Series (TV Series 2015)

1.plot: Carson blows the big presentation and reluctantly follows Mickey to a defunct karate dojo for his first class at the "Tom Perkins Acting Intensive."

2.title: Week 2: Regional Dialect

episode of.title: Master Class: The Web Series (TV Series 2015)

2.plot: Tom schools the class on regional accents by having them stage his Faulknerian Southern Gothic play, "Cry Heav'n's Mercy, Night's Harlot!"

3.title: Week 3: Monologues

episode of.title: Master Class: The Web Series (TV Series 2015)

3.plot: The class is just trying to learn how to make a few minutes of onscreen time really pop, when they get an unexpected visit in the practice space.

4.title: Week 4: Comedy

episode of.title: Master Class: The Web Series (TV Series 2015)

4.plot: Tom hands off teaching duties to comedy guru Lynn Smiley, who immediately clashes with the class.

5.title: Week 5: Crying

episode of.title: Master Class: The Web Series (TV Series 2015)

5.plot: The Class learns the most important thing an actor can do, but Carson refuses to join in the waterworks. Luckily for him, the class is derailed by the strip-mall handyman, Cord.

6.title: Week 6: Onscreen Intimacy

episode of.title: Master Class: The Web Series (TV Series 2015)

6.plot: Indie Sensation Frank Mosley comes back to class to teach his specialty. Tom cannot participate, though, due to pending legal matters.

7.title: Week 7: Auditions

episode of.title: Master Class: The Web Series (TV Series 2015)

7.plot: Tom tries to hide that he's lost the dojo for good, so he throws the class into prepping Kim for a big audition. Their temporary home: a pre-school classroom.

8.title: Week 8: Cry Heav'n's Mercy, Night's Harlot!

episode of.title: Master Class: The Web Series (TV Series 2015)

8.plot: The class begins to mutiny, so Tom pulls out all the stops: a full-scale "production" of his Southern Gothic play. The venue: a redneck barbecue at Cord's place.

9.title: Cry Heav'n's Mercy, Night's Harlot! Part II

episode of.title: Master Class: The Web Series (TV Series 2015)

9.plot: The audience is restless. As Tom exhorts all students to stay in character no matter what, the class begins to unravel.

10.title: Week 10: Fin de Partie

episode of.title: Master Class: The Web Series (TV Series 2015)

10.plot: The whole class has quit and scattered. Carson suddenly realizes after a show of courage at work that he's grown some brass ones - all due to Tom's Master Class. Can he talk his way back into Tom's good graces and bring them all back together?

imdb.plot outline: Master Class is a ten-episode original comedy series, following public-speaking-phobe Carson (Peyton Freiman) and his work friend Mickey (Briana McKeague) into an acting class in a suburban strip-mall: the "Tom Perkins Acting Intensive," taught by emotionally-irresponsible former child star "Tomcat" Perkins (Bill Wise.) There, they contend with a never-was action idol, an escapee from children's theatre, and a predatory improv troupe, while they try to find Carson's courage, Mickey's heart, and Tomcat's sense of shame.
imdb.title: Master Class: The Web Series
akas: Master Class: The Web Series (United States)
plot: Master Class is a ten-episode original comedy series, following public-speaking-phobe Carson (Peyton Freiman) and his work friend Mickey (Briana McKeague) into an acting class in a suburban strip-mall: the "Tom Perkins Acting Intensive," taught by emotionally-irresponsible former child star "Tomcat" Perkins (Bill Wise.) There, they contend with a never-was action idol, an escapee from children's theatre, and a predatory improv troupe, while they try to find Carson's courage, Mickey's heart, and Tomcat's sense of shame.
